snippet: MELNICK--Thelma, at the age of 95. Beloved wife of the late Elliot, devoted mother of Marc Melnick and his wife, Debra and the late Freda Melnick, dear sister of Madelaine Sokolsky and the late Leah Kaplan and loving grandmother of Alexis and Samantha Melnick. Funeral service 10am Wednesday at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MELNICK--Thelma, at the age of 95. Beloved wife of the late Elliot, devoted mother of Marc Melnick and his wife, Debra and the late Freda Melnick, dear sister of Madelaine Sokolsky and the late Leah Kaplan and loving grandmother of Alexis and Samantha Melnick.
